description.value:
Prerequisite: Warlock, Sorcerer-King Pact class feature

Benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to Nature checks.

When you augment hand of blight, you can forgo the extra damage the augment would deal to instead teleport the target a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier to an unoccupied square adjacent to an ally you can see.

Published in Dragon Magazine 390.
